name: Emobi
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Seattle, WA, USA
long_description:
Emobi offers instantaneous access to a vast network of EV charging networks and e-mobility partners, while ensuring superior data quality through our refinement models. Our ecosystem guarantees a seamless and high-quality charging experience. At Emobi's V2X and JustPlug Lab, we also utilize Plug & Charge (ISO 15118) and Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) technologies to facilitate secure communication among electric vehicles, chargers, grid systems, and city infrastructures.

Emobi has garnered trust from leading EV manufacturers, e-mobility enterprises, startups, and esteemed U.S. Government Agencies like the Department of Energy (DoE) and the Department of Transportation (DoT). Join us as we drive innovation in the dynamic world of e-mobility.
one_liner: The EV charging ecosystem that powers hundreds of businesses with AI
